00079 void LocalLinearRegression::train
00080 (
00081         const Array< double >& x,
00082         const Array< double >& y
00083 )
00084 {
00085     SIZE_CHECK( x.ndim( ) > 0 && x.ndim( ) <= 2 )
00086 
00087     unsigned index;
00088 
00089     if( x.ndim( ) == 1 )
00090         {
00091         index = nearest( x );
00092                 lr( index ).train( x - m[ index ], y );
00093     }
00094         else
00095         {
00096         SIZE_CHECK( x.dim( 0 ) == y.dim( 0 ) )
00097 
00098                 for( unsigned i = 0, j = 0; i < x.dim( 0 ); ++i, j += x.dim( 1 ) )
00099                 {
00100                         index = nearest( x[ i ] );
00101                         lr( index ).train( x[ i ] - m[ index ], y[ i ] );
00102                 }
00103     }
00104 }
